anya-e1215n:29: Savaṇā lapanā ceva satiyā cāpi vandanā,
anya-e1215n:35: Yo lokatilako nātho pūretvā dasa pāramī,
anya-e1215n:38: Ārādhito surādīhi kālo mārisa te ayaṃ,
anya-e1215n:41: Etadatthāya te vīra pūritā dasa pāramī,
anya-e1215n:42: Bāhuṃ pitussa putto’va loko ālambate tuvaṃ;
anya-e1215n:44: Tesaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā mahāsatto mahāmatī,
anya-e1215n:56: Janānaṃ nīlanettehi vadanehi tu yā purī,
anya-e1215n:104: Nivedetvā tamatthaṃ sā rañño tena susajjite,
anya-e1215n:119: Brahmāno lokapālā ca manussā kamato tadā,
anya-e1215n:122: Mahiṃ patiṭṭhito dhīro passitvāna tato disā,
anya-e1215n:134: Dibbehi rūpasaddehi gandhehi ca rasehi ca,
anya-e1215n:141: Dassetvā’sesasippaṃ taṃ loke vijjati yaṃ tadā;
anya-e1215n:143: Ñātisaṅghaṃ pamodento deve ca manuje’pi ca,
anya-e1215n:171: Sasī’va dassanīyo ca sūriyo viya tejavā;
anya-e1215n:207: Vajjanti bheriyo tāsu paggayha kāci nāriyo;
anya-e1215n:210: Dhamanti susiraṃ kāci kāci vādenti tantiyo;
anya-e1215n:218: Disvāna so tamacchariyaṃ viratto visaye tadā,
anya-e1215n:225: Iccevaṃ cintayanto so supantova sayī tahiṃ;
anya-e1215n:228: So’yaṃ’dāni supī’ amhe kassadāni karoma taṃ?;
anya-e1215n:230: Iti cintiya te tattha turiyesu sake sake,
anya-e1215n:233: Khādanti kāci dantāni kāci lālā vahantiyo,
anya-e1215n:236: Kākacchanti’pi semhampi gilanti ca camanti ca,
anya-e1215n:237: Karonti nādaṃ nāsāya gharū’ti ca khipanti ca;
anya-e1215n:239: Muttayanti tadā kāci rahassaṃ vicaranti ca,
anya-e1215n:240: Duggandhaṃ vāti taṃ ṭhānaṃ susānaṃ āmakaṃ yathā;
anya-e1215n:243: Addakkhi tāsaṃ nekāni vikārāni tahiṃ tadā;
anya-e1215n:258: Buddho hutvāpi’maṃ sakkā passituṃ iti cintiya;
anya-e1215n:260: Gato nātho tato ṭhānā bodhiyā baddhamānaso
anya-e1215n:261: Tadahevāsi buddhoti kāmuko ko na cintaye;
anya-e1215n:285: Pasatto tattha turago dukkhato agamī tadā;
anya-e1215n:290: Tīraṭṭho passi so dhīro gaṅgānāriṃ rasāvahaṃ,
anya-e1215n:296: Pabbajituṃ mayettheva yuttaṃ no me papañcituṃ,
anya-e1215n:303: Tiṭṭhatu gagane gantvā iti ukkhipi ca’mbaraṃ;
anya-e1215n:308: Kāretvā maṇithūpaṃ so nīdhetvā taṃ siroruhaṃ,
anya-e1215n:314: Pubbe viyambaraṃ gayha ambare khipi nāyako,
anya-e1215n:315: Paṭiggahetvā taṃ brahmā netvā brahmapuraṃ caraṃ;
anya-e1215n:323: Tato ambavanaṃ gantvā vindanto pītijaṃ sukhaṃ,
anya-e1215n:333: Disvā evaṃ vicintesuṃ nāyaṃ yo so janādhipo;
anya-e1215n:338: Sutvāna taṃ tadā keci hasantā vacanantaraṃ,
anya-e1215n:339: Nāyaṃ sasī sasaṅekā so bhānumeso’ti no mati;
anya-e1215n:344: Kiṃ bho ummattakā attha evaṃ mā vadathā’dhunā,
anya-e1215n:345: Sataraṃsī uṇharaṃsī na so eso aviggaho;
anya-e1215n:348: Sarūpena na no atthi saṃsayo balu mānase;
anya-e1215n:350: Tesaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā hasantā keci jantuno,
anya-e1215n:351: Tumhe khalū na jānātha sabāṇe sadhanū hi so;
anya-e1215n:354: Kelāso iti sampatto jahātha vimatiṃ idha;
anya-e1215n:356: Tesampi vacanaṃ sutvā hasanteke janā tadā,
anya-e1215n:357: Nāyaṃ haro tinetto so kesaveso idhāgato;
anya-e1215n:360: Vesenaññena maññāma ettha no natthi saṃsayo;
anya-e1215n:362: Paharitvā karaṃ keci sutvā taṃ vacanaṃ narā,
anya-e1215n:363: Hasantevaṃ tadāvocuṃ vāsudevo na ve ayaṃ;
anya-e1215n:369: Passitunti paṭiññāto mā bhonto vilapantu ve;
anya-e1215n:371: Sutvā tesaṃ giraṃ keci keḷiṃ katvāna nekadhā,
anya-e1215n:372: Tumhe sakkaṃ na jānātha so hi bho vajirāyudho;
anya-e1215n:374: Eso hi bho mahābrahmā brahmalokā idhāgato,
anya-e1215n:375: Pamattā kinnu vedamhī brahmabandhu pure idha;
anya-e1215n:378: Nete candādayo kāmaṃ mā mohaṃ bho pakāsatha;
anya-e1215n:386: Evaṃ vadantā sabbe te nāgarā purisuttamaṃ,
anya-e1215n:390: Jantavo mananāvāyo pāraṃ passiṃsu no tadā;
anya-e1215n:401: Amataṃ viya taṃ bhutvā vikkhāletvā mukhaṃ dakā,
anya-e1215n:402: Patte vattaṃ caritvāna muhuttaṃ tattha vissami;
anya-e1215n:414: Pakāsetvāna lokassa mokkhaṃ natthiti tena so;
anya-e1215n:422: Tadā senāni nigame sujātā khīra dāyikā,
anya-e1215n:428: Yathā mayhaṃ mahādeva iddhā patthita patthanā,
anya-e1215n:431: Iti vatvāna vanditvā katvā ca naṃ padakkhiṇaṃ,
anya-e1215n:441: Disvāna supine pañca atthaṃ tesaṃ vicintiya;
anya-e1215n:453: Tato mahiṃ dvidhā katvā samuṭṭhāsi mahāsanaṃ;
anya-e1215n:458: Kāmaṃ taco nahārū ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu,
anya-e1215n:461: Na uṭṭhahāmabujjhitvā na jahe vīriyaṃ mama,
anya-e1215n:522: Nāgatā neva vāhesuṃ sabbe etthe’va osaṭā;
anya-e1215n:525: Nāgādayo na dhutāsuṃ ketunaṃ bahu kā kathā;
anya-e1215n:528: Tārakā gagane brūmo kinnu tattha dhajālutā;
anya-e1215n:546: Nosīnā dharaṇī bhārā disebhānaṃ balaṃ aho;
anya-e1215n:566: Kañcanādāsahatthā ca kācī kaññā tathā ṭhitā,
anya-e1215n:569: Kāci maṅgala saṃyutta vacanā tava patthanā,
anya-e1215n:575: Naccanti keci kīḷanti selenti ca lalanti ca,
anya-e1215n:576: Vādenti keci gāyanti velukkhepaṃ karonti ca;
anya-e1215n:600: Pūjāvisesaṃ taṃ ko hi mukhenekena bhāsatī;
anya-e1215n:603: Dasakaṇṭho’pi taṃ sabbaṃ neva sakkonti bhāsituṃ;
anya-e1215n:608: Tasmintu vāsare māro passitvā bhuvanaṃ idaṃ,
anya-e1215n:611: Sabbe dibbavimānā bho suññā dissanti chaḍḍitā,
anya-e1215n:614: Kimbho māra na jānāsi matto sutto’si ajja kiṃ,
anya-e1215n:618: Bodhimule nisinno si ajja buddho bhavāmīti;
anya-e1215n:623: Kinnu te badhiraṃ sotaṃ kinnu parihāyi locanaṃ,
anya-e1215n:624: Dhajaggā te na dissanti ullolaṃ te na sūyati;
anya-e1215n:626: Tesaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā antako khalu pāpimā,
anya-e1215n:630: Asāro khalu saṃsāro siddhatthe vibhavaṃ gate;
anya-e1215n:635: Nirālokaṃ tilokaṃ bho asuraṃ vāsaraṃ yathā,
anya-e1215n:644: Māpetha bheravaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bībhacchaṃ duddasaṃ kharaṃ,
anya-e1215n:647: Tassa taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā mārasenā samāgamuṃ,
anya-e1215n:653: Disvāna durato ettaṃ devā māraṃ savāhiniṃ,
anya-e1215n:656: Saṃkhippa khippaṃ sacchattaṃ brahmā dhāvi parammukho,
anya-e1215n:657: Katvāna piṭṭhiyaṃ saṅkhaṃ sakko dhāvi visaṅkito;
anya-e1215n:675: Andhakāraṃ disā āsuṃ dhūmaketu ca ambare;
anya-e1215n:690: Na yuttañhi gajo yāti gajaṃ no yāti kotthukaṃ;
anya-e1215n:692: Netaṃ garu palāpetuṃ kālo iti vicintiya,
anya-e1215n:714: Cāletuṃ neva so sakkhi aṃsumattampi cīvare;
anya-e1215n:720: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n:726: Hotu dāni mahoghena pavāhemi imaṃ yatiṃ,
anya-e1215n:742: Mahābhīma nabho bherissanā āsuṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e1215n:757: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n:763: Bhavatajja kimetena māraṇe tassa kiṃ garu,
anya-e1215n:766: Iti cintiya so māro māpetvāṅgāra vuṭṭhiyo,
anya-e1215n:788: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n:792: Dukkhito dummano hutvā evaṃ cintesi dummati;
anya-e1215n:810: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n:826: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n:829: Taṃ disvā pāpimā kuddho yaṃ yaṃ tassa karoma’haṃ,
anya-e1215n:830: Taṃ taṃ’dānī na sakkoti kiñci kākumu’pakkamaṃ;
anya-e1215n:842: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n:845: Tato disvāna taṃ kaṇho kaṇhasenā purakkhato,
anya-e1215n:846: Saṅkuddho pesayi tattha vassaṃ so sikatāmayaṃ;
anya-e1215n:855: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n:861: Iti cintiya māpetvā pesesi palipaṃ ghanaṃ,
anya-e1215n:862: Dhūpāyanto pajjalanto gantvā so nabhasā lahuṃ;
anya-e1215n:871: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n:877: Mayhaṃ bhāroti cintetvā māpesi timiraṃ ghanaṃ;
anya-e1215n:880: Gantvāna gaganā so hi patvāna munisantikaṃ;
anya-e1215n:889: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n:892: Evaṃ navahi vuṭṭhihi katvā māro mahā bhavaṃ,
anya-e1215n:901: Tatheva so mahiṃ kuddho māro khipati vegavā,
anya-e1215n:904: Tatheva kupito tena khipate so mahambudhiṃ,
anya-e1215n:905: Vilayaṃ jalajā yanti sussate so mahaṇṇavo;
anya-e1215n:914: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n:917: Iti kopagginā dittamanaṃ māraṃ tadā jino,
anya-e1215n:920: Evaṃ katvāpi so kuddho aladdhavijayo tadā,
anya-e1215n:929: Athagā saha vācāhi bhiṃsā sā māravāhinī,
anya-e1215n:948: Bhujaṅge ca guṇe keci gāḷhamākaḍḍhayanti ca;
anya-e1215n:963: Gattena rakkhasā hutvā keci dhāvanti kiṅakarā;
anya-e1215n:977: Gilantā keci phaṇino uggirantā tatheva ca,
anya-e1215n:978: Sīsa kandhara kaṇṇanta bāhu aṅguli ādisu;
anya-e1215n:987: Lālayantā sakā jivhā khandhe katvāna muggare,
anya-e1215n:999: Yaṃ diṭṭha suta mattena maraṇaṃ citta vibbhamaṃ,
anya-e1215n:1000: Yāti loko kathaṃ ko taṃ nissesaṃ bhāsate naro;
anya-e1215n:1017: Sahassabāhuṃ māpetvā chūrikā yaṭṭhi satti ca,
anya-e1215n:1027: Āvahanto bhayaṃ brahma sura siddhādīnaṃ tadā,
anya-e1215n:1036: Akampo so munī evamagge’kāsi nijaṃ balaṃ,
anya-e1215n:1055: Suṇātha bho giraṃ mayhaṃ bhavatajja mahā bhavo;
anya-e1215n:1057: Etha yātha samaggattha na ossakkatha sujjhatha,
anya-e1215n:1060: Ajja gacchati niṭṭhānaṃ so bho pāramitābhaṭā,
anya-e1215n:1063: Atha dānabhaṭo āha apphoṭaṃ diguṇaṃ bhujaṃ,
anya-e1215n:1067: Ubho passe karitvāna saseno dhāvi dappavā;
anya-e1215n:1079: Sosemi mama tejena vadaṃ’gā māra sāgaraṃ;
anya-e1215n:1088: Nisidi tassa tejena nirussāhāsi sā camū;
anya-e1215n:1090: Aho bho vimhayaṃ dāni suṇātha munino mama,
anya-e1215n:1094: Aduṭṭho jeti sambuddho ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n:1097: Nirāyudho’va taṃ jeti ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n:1100: Niccalo jeti sambuddho ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n:1103: Nisinnova jino jeti ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n:1106: Nissaddo jeti sambuddho ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n:1112: Khippaṃ siddhattha he gaccha santakedaṃ mamāsanaṃ;
anya-e1215n:1114: No ce gacchasi te hadayaṃ phālemi nakhasattihi,
anya-e1215n:1117: Passa me mahatiṃ senaṃ passa āyudhasañcayaṃ,
anya-e1215n:1118: Tena taṃ abhimaddāmi tuvaṭaṃ gacchidaṃ mama;
anya-e1215n:1121: Kadā te pūritā māra pallaṅkatthāya pāramī;
anya-e1215n:1123: Kadā adāsi sīsādī dānaṃ sīlaṃ kathaṃ tava,
anya-e1215n:1126: Athā’ha pharuso māro netaṃ garu mune mama,
anya-e1215n:1127: Ayaṃ sā parisā sabbā tassa paccakkhakārakaṃ;
anya-e1215n:1132: Athāha māro samaṇa ahaṃ sakkhi kathāpayiṃ,
anya-e1215n:1133: Tava ko sakkhi yajjatthi kathāpehi lahuṃ mama;
anya-e1215n:1135: Athāha bhagavā tassa gambhīraṃ madhuraṃ giraṃ,
anya-e1215n:1138: Taveva me na santīdha paccakkhatthaṃ sacetanā,
anya-e1215n:1141: Iti vatvāna mārāri sañtdhā jimūta gabbhato,
anya-e1215n:1168: Aṅguliyo mukhe keci pakkhipanti rudanti ca,
anya-e1215n:1169: Keci vandanti yāvanti abhayaṃ sāmi dehi no;
anya-e1215n:1177: Taṅkaṇe uggato āsi satthu kitti jayaddhajo,
anya-e1215n:1184: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n:1190: Devā te nikhilā netvā nānāpūjāvidhiṃ tato,
anya-e1215n:1200: Dhamentā viya saṅkhāni kūjenti madhuraṃ giraṃ;
anya-e1215n:1218: Āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇā laddhā aggaphalaṃ tadā;
anya-e1215n:1226: Gahakāraka diṭṭhosi puna gehaṃ na kāhasi,
anya-e1215n:1227: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhitaṃ,
anya-e1215n:1238: Pāpārayo ca vijito sa dadātu santiṃ;
anya-e1215n:1355: Hā tāta hā tāta kimāsi tedaṃ
anya-e1215n:1356: Naṭṭhannu te kiṃ vada patthasī kiṃ,
anya-e1215n:1532: Giriṃ nakhena khaṇatha ayo dantehi khādatha;
anya-e1215n:1829: Tvaṃ ko’si re! Iti paro aparaṃ kharena
anya-e1215n:1848: Muḷhā disañca vidisaṃ na vidiṃsu bhītā,
anya-e1215n:1880: Ogamma tattha puthu patthari camma kaṇḍaṃ;
anya-e1215n:1899: Tasmimpi te pavisituṃ saraṇaṃ na laddhā
anya-e1215n:1925: Lokagga puggala varaṃ dada sāmi dhīsa;
anya-e1215n:1929: Tumhe vinā khaṇalavaṃ vasituṃ na icche
anya-e1215n:1939: Katvā’tha so vara mahaṃ tidivehi saddhi
anya-e1215n:1980: Magge phale ca saraṇe ca patiṭṭhahiṃsu
anya-e1215n:2020: Atha ca duhituyā so dīyamānaṃ dadanto
anya-e1215n:2056: Sumana sumana nāmaṃ passi devaṃ samiddhiṃ;
anya-e1215n:2111: Thuti mukhara mukhā tā sādhu kīḷaṃ akaṃsu;
anya-e1215n:2113: Atha muni uragānaṃ viggahaṃ taṃ sametuṃ
anya-e1215n:2118: Na bho bho saṃsāre khalu bhavati sāraṃ lavampi
anya-e1215n:2119: Visesā taṃ sītaṃ jalita dahane vijjati kadā,
anya-e1215n:2120: Sadā rāgaṃ rogaṃ byadhati janataṃ nekaduritaṃ
anya-e1215n:2123: Sarīro’yaṃ battiṃsa vidha kuṇapo sāra rahito
anya-e1215n:2126: Athevaṃ sante bho varayati bhavaṃ ko nu hi budho;
anya-e1215n:2130: Phaṇī majjāro sā guhaka kapayo bhūya bahuso
anya-e1215n:2133: Pure kāko’lukā atha vanabhavā phandana isā
anya-e1215n:2138: Balaṃ bālānaṃ bho saka saka vadhāyeva bhavati
anya-e1215n:2140: Gajaṃ bālaṃ mattaṃ pavidhi na balaṃ hoti saraṇaṃ
anya-e1215n:2141: Athaṭṭhāne kiṃ bho kurutha vīriyaṃ bhuti hananaṃ;
anya-e1215n:2143: Na dukkhaṃ tesaṃ ye vigata kalahā ekamanasā
anya-e1215n:2144: Atīte bho lāpā aghaṭita mānā peyyavacanā,
anya-e1215n:2145: Sukhaṃ vāsaṃ’kāsuṃ yadahani bhavuṃ te’tha vidhurā
anya-e1215n:2150: Atha muditamanā te pīṇitā tassa nāgā
anya-e1215n:2154: Taruṇa raviva tasmiṃ āsane āsi bhāsaṃ,
anya-e1215n:2168: Yadi sugata! Imaṃ tvaṃ nāgato assa ṭhānaṃ
anya-e1215n:2171: Pasami dahana dittaṃ ambudeneva taṃ tvaṃ;
anya-e1215n:2179: Yadi manasi dayā te hoti dāse punā’pi,
anya-e1215n:2186: Sa sumana taru rājaṃ pūjanatthaṃ vidhāya;
anya-e1215n:2191: Dadati iti ca vatvā ovaditvāna satthā;
anya-e1215n:2299: Yo neka kappa sata sañcita puññarāsi
anya-e1215n:2302: Ko tattha bhuti matulaṃ kathiko katheti;
anya-e1215n:2321: Ñatvā taṃ sumano nāgo lahumāgamma sīhalaṃ,
anya-e1215n:2327: Datvā tulādayo sesa mandiraṅge tatheva ca,
anya-e1215n:2334: Soṇṇa kiṅkiṇi mālāyo kaṇṇamālā ca māpiya;
anya-e1215n:2357: Sañcinitvāna te nāgā khajja bhojja phalāphale,
anya-e1215n:2360: Tato kāruṇiko nātho bodhito aṭṭhame same,
anya-e1215n:2393: Sāsanodaya selagge sūriyo viya bhāti yo,
anya-e1215n:2397: Pākaṭo bhuvane so’pi gato sambuddha santikaṃ;
anya-e1215n:2447: Tato sambuddha dehasmā nikkhantāsuṃ cha raṃsiyo,
anya-e1215n:2472: Uggantvā parato yantī nīra nijjhara sannībhā;
anya-e1215n:2475: Kārayantā sakaṃ vaṇṇaṃ dhāvantā’pi ca sindhavo;
anya-e1215n:2496: Yāti kiṃ buhmalokannu amhākaṃ bhavanannu kho;
anya-e1215n:2505: Yāvamānā jinaṃ keci tiṭṭhanti ca mahanti ca;
anya-e1215n:2519: Yesaṃ yesaṃ manasmiṃ yaṃ yamatthi kiñci saṃsayaṃ,
anya-e1215n:2520: Tesaṃ taṃ taṃ paṇudento desanāya sudhāsinaṃ;
anya-e1215n:2526: Paṭimaggaṃ karontā te tattha tattha mahāmahaṃ;
anya-e1215n:2531: Ye passanti jinaṃ tattha sasissaṃ siriyā jalaṃ,
anya-e1215n:2534: Ye suṇanti tadā dhammaṃ dhammissara pabhāvitaṃ,
anya-e1215n:2535: Suladdhā tehi sotāni tesaṃ sotāni sotakā;
anya-e1215n:2538: Suladdhā tehi ve jivhā tesaṃ jivhā rasaññakā
anya-e1215n:2540: Ye vandanti jinaṃ yantaṃ sasaṅghaṃ gaganaṅgane,
anya-e1215n:2541: Suladdhā tehi hatthāni tesaṃyeva bhujā bhujā;
anya-e1215n:2543: Tadā tathāgataṃ disvā ye santuṭṭhā tathāgataṃ,
anya-e1215n:2544: Tathāgatānaṃ sabbesaṃ yo toso hotu sabbadā;
anya-e1215n:2549: Tato gaṅgā manuññañhi sampattaṃ taṃ saputtakaṃ,
anya-e1215n:2555: Tato so yācito satthā nāgasaṅghehi vandiya,
anya-e1215n:2561: Tato bhikkhu nisīdiṃsu patta pattāsane tadā,
anya-e1215n:2568: Nettinda maṇināvāhi pāraṃ gantuṃ na te pabhu;
anya-e1215n:2570: Tato sasaṅghaṃ sugataṃ sajano maṇi akkhiko,
anya-e1215n:2584: Maggā janā khalu labhanti kadā patiṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e1215n:2589: Jātī jarā maraṇa dukkha pariddavā ca
anya-e1215n:2600: Rūpe na rajjatha tato khalu sādhupaññā;
anya-e1215n:2642: Evaṃ saddhammamaggaṃ varamati sugato desayi pannagānaṃ
anya-e1215n:2643: Sutvā te sampahaṭṭhā mahamahamakaruṃ nijjarādīhi saddhiṃ,
anya-e1215n:2644: Tesaṃ ve desanāyaṃ suraviṭapi samā sātthikā tattha jātā
anya-e1215n:2645: So nātho tañca dhammaṃ bhagavati tanayā te ca vo pālayantu
anya-e1215n:2725: Madhuka vaṭa kareri bodhi jambīra bhalli
anya-e1215n:2763: Siddhā ca siddhavanitā hi tahiṃ tahiṃ te
anya-e1215n:2769: Gokaṇṇa salla sasa jambuka sūkarā ca,
anya-e1215n:2779: Cakkavha kīra kurarā kulalā ca kaṅkā,
anya-e1215n:2795: Kāsātha sopi muni tassa vacaṃ paṭicca
anya-e1215n:2808: Gacchante gaganāyanena sugate bhānu’si santo tadā
anya-e1215n:2809: Vāresuṃ sūriyātapañca jaladā siñjiṃsu bhumyā jalaṃ,
anya-e1215n:2810: Mandāmanda sugandha muddha pavano pāpeti sitaṃ sukhaṃ,
anya-e1215n:2811: Devādi dhaja chatta cāmarakarā pūjenti mānenti ca;
anya-e1215n:3038: Evaṃ so dhammarājā janahitavihito vīta dosārivaggo
anya-e1215n:3040: Taṃ vo saggā’pavaggaṃ dadati munisamaṃ citta matte pasanne
anya-e1215n:3041: Tasmā bho!Bho! Pahaṭṭhā namatha mahatha taṃ sādhu sādhuppasatthaṃ;
anya-e1215n:3046: Tatheva sādhū saṅakappā khippaṃ pappontu pāṇinaṃ;
anya-e1215n:3057: Tassa sisso’si yo vippagāma vaṃseka ketuko
